      • mergeState

        boolean mergeState(java.lang.String name,
                   int epoch,
                   java.lang.String mergee,
                   int mergeeEpoch,
                   java.lang.String state)
        Merge state, i.e., append instead of replacing state, exactly once. The tricky part is to ensure exactly-once semantics, which we ensure by maintaining a "merged" set in ReconfigurationRecord.
        Parameters:
        name -
        epoch -
        mergee -
        mergeeEpoch -
        state -
        Returns:
        True if merged successfully.
